meanings.definition: A pair of small membranous lobes at the base of the wings of certain flies.
meanings.sent1: The calypters help flies steer and balance during flight.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the calypters of the fly under a microscope.
meanings.sent3: The calypters of the fly acted like tiny rudders as it buzzed around the room.
meanings.sent4: The calypters of the fly were like delicate sails guiding it through the air.
meanings.sent5: The calypters of the fly fluttered gracefully as it landed on the flower.
